name: Battle for Andromeda
description: Hi there! I'm Tragedy Boy, and this is my first game ever! I did it for for the PixiJs course "Oficios de la Economía del Conocimiento: Desarrollo de Videojuegos", organized by the amazing people of The Rabbit Hole. Please note this was made for practice and learning, thus it's not a full or polish game. It was made using the PixiJs library. Hope you enjoy it!
